formattedAddress: 520 W 218th St A, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 520 W 218th St A, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: I am so thankful to have come here for my physical therapy. Larry Shapiro and his staff provide great service, they are all very professional, attentive and go above and beyond for me on every visit. I had a total knee replacement 1 month ago.Thanks to the PT I am receiving, I am feeling positive that I will be back to my normal self soon. I have my days when I come to pt feeling negative, not wanting to put in the work but they are so very nice and hep me get through. I recommend this place to anyone, you will not regret coming here. A special shout out to my therapist Rob, Larry, Maria and the rest of the staff, they are all very pleasant from the moment you walk through the door.

originalText.text:
Do not judge a book by its cover. This PT clinic may not look as fancy as many others, and yes, space is a bit tight. But this is the real deal! Not only is the service quite remarkable, fast, efficiently and friendly, but the therapists are absolute tops! Maybe exactly because of the ‘old school’ facilities, the staff here learn to trust their hands, and each of the therapists I have had here are simply superb. Robert in particular stands out, but everyone at Shapiro’s has the skills needed. I had a complicated case (trigger muscle, Lyme disease) that a few sessions in Robert’s skilful hands (along with Doxycycline) has helped in a truly remarkable fashion. I am now almost fully functional after a handful of sessions.
Highest recommendations!

originalText.text: Larry Shapiro is extremely knowledgeable and really cares to explain to patients what has caused their physical challenge and how to fix it. He's a pleasure to interact with. Moreover, all the staff that I have met are just wonderful. I'm glad I chose to go hear based on the recommendation of neighbors.

Moreover, all the staff that I have met are just wonderful. I'm glad I chose to go hear based on the recommendation of neighbors.

originalText.text: Larry Shapiro Therapy is an excellent facility staffed with the best people for the job and clearly demonstrate best practices in service delivery. The rooms and reception area are clean, airy and all personnel/patients wear masks. The receptionists are warm and helpful. Catherine is knowledgeable, friendly and professional. Apo is patient and well educated regarding the principles of homeopathic and traditional physical therapy. I met Larry once, he is very friendly and down to earth. Great job all round!

originalText.text: Great service!! Best therapist is Apo. He is very good and patient. The staff are very nice and professional.
